tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ControlledSubstances (
  substance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  substance_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  quantity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  expiration_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Distribution(
   distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   substance_id INT,
   distributor_id INT,
   quantity DECIMAL,
   distribution_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE controlled_substances (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    substance_name STRING,
    distribution_date DATE,
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE shipments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  distribution_center_id INT,
  substance_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  shipment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE inspections (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspector_id INT,
  distribution_center_id INT,
  inspection_date DATE,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
);
